code: import axios from"axios";import{useEffect}from"react";var TestnetGetAccountAPI=function TestnetGetAccountAPI(props){var response=props.response,pubKey=props.pubKey;useEffect(function(){axios.get("https://horizon-testnet.stellar.org/accounts/".concat(pubKey)).then(function(res){response(res.data.balances[0].balance);console.log(res.data);}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});},[pubKey]);return null;};export default TestnetGetAccountAPI;
